name: Flappy Cars 3D
description:
3D flying cars are coming in a new, hard and fun to play game!
It's not normal Flappy Bird clone!

Main features of Flappy Cars 3D:

- Tap to flap and make your car fly!
- Don't destroy your car!
- Unique 3D graphics.
- Unlock 26 playable cars.
- Get high score, be the best.
- Super retro music and sound effects.
- Very addictive and nice to play game.
- Global leaderboards and achievements.

WARNING! Super fun and very addictive! WARNING!

Flappy Cars 3D game was made for flappyjam 2014 by Evil Indie Games.
It features many famous and loved paper cars form Evil Indie Games "Cars And Guns 3D" game.

The cars now have wings.
They can fly!
Pure action with cars in 3D!

Remember:
It's not a bird, it's not a plane, it's flappy car! :)
